Module Simulator
Package kin.invkin.closed

Class InverseKinematicsSimpleArmLinear

java.lang.Object
kin.invkin.closed.InverseKinematicsSimpleArmLinear
All Implemented Interfaces:
InverseKinematics
public class InverseKinematicsSimpleArmLinear
extends java.lang.Object
implements InverseKinematics
The inverse kinematics for a simple arm with three servos:
  • a stand servo to set the direction to target (0°: y-direction),
  • femur servo
  • and tibia linear motor to position the gripper in the directed plane.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    InverseKinematicsSimpleArmLinear​(Body body, Servo standServo, Servo femurServo, LinearMotor tibiaMotor, double standHeight)
    Create an inverse kinematics computation instance for a simple arm with two servos and a linear motor.

  • Constructor Details

    • InverseKinematicsSimpleArmLinear

      public InverseKinematicsSimpleArmLinear​(Body body, Servo standServo, Servo femurServo, LinearMotor tibiaMotor, double standHeight)
      Create an inverse kinematics computation instance for a simple arm with two servos and a linear motor.
      Parameters:
      body - the dynamic body component, required if global target coordinates are given
      standServo - the stand servo dynamic component
      femurServo - the femur servo dynamic component
      tibiaMotor - the tibia linear motor dynamic component
      standHeight - the height from body to femur servo
